headline: Kentucky Banana Pudding
name: Kentucky Banana Pudding
description: This banana pudding is made with evaporated milk and features a crust of vanilla wafers topped with creamy pudding and a layer of sliced bananas.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine evaporated milk, milk, sugar, cornstarch, and egg in a saucepan over medium heat. Cook and stir until thick. Remove pudding from heat; add vanilla and mix well.
Arrange a layer of wafers in a large bowl or casserole dish. Pour pudding over wafers and top with banana slices. Refrigerate until chilled, about 1 hour.
